CustomField.description: A hyperlink to the source record that triggered the generation of the reward
CustomField.formula: IF (LEN(success__Rewarded_Object_Id__c)<1, NULL, HYPERLINK("/" & success__Rewarded_Object_Id__c, "Link to Record","_parent"))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Hyperlink to the source record that generated the reward
CustomField.label: Reward Source
